com.koucha.experimentalgame.effects

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koucha.experimentalgame.effects.Effect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EffectProjectile, EffectRay

    public abstract class Effect
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameObject
    Represents a visual effect, that is to be added to a GameObjectList

    They should remove themselves from this list via endEffect() method after they expire
